name: I Media
tag_list: pr, communication, press-office, events, web-pr, web-2-0, public-relations, strategy
overview:
I Media PR & Communication is a dinamic agency focusing on consulting, management and support communication activity. I Media realizes specific and coordinated tools and initiatives targeted on your real communication needs, developing complete communication strategy, press office activities, events, and others. Thanks to the I Media Network of specialized professionals, we are able to provide a competent and complete service to our clients, operating in Italy, aiming to develop their image and brand awareness.
